oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthetic Utility of Sugar-Derived Cyclic Nitrones: A Diastereoselective Synthesis of Linear 4-Azatriquinanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDARU, A
KALIAPPAN, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diastereoselectivity
sugar derivatives
nitrones
Pauson-Khand reaction
PAUSON-KHAND REACTION
STEREOSELECTIVE-SYNTHESIS
CLOSING METATHESIS
TRIQUINANES
CYCLIZATION
CYCLOADDITION
ROUTE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A diastereoselective Pauson-Khand reaction has been utilized as the key step in the construction of azatriquinanes from sugar-derived nitrones.
